body_html: I'm wondering if standard_gamma is distinct enough to not be confused with the regular gamma function. Couldn't we expose it as an internal method in _C and realize the sampling only through the torch.distributions API?
body_text: I'm wondering if standard_gamma is distinct enough to not be confused with the regular gamma function. Couldn't we expose it as an internal method in _C and realize the sampling only through the torch.distributions API?
body: I'm wondering if `standard_gamma` is distinct enough to not be confused with the regular gamma function. Couldn't we expose it as an internal method in `_C` and realize the sampling only through the `torch.distributions` API?
